anyflights 0.3.0
  • Reference
  • News
  • How To Contribute

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

v 0.3.0

  • Add progress updates to anyflights() and get_flights() (#4)
  • Clarify documentation on best practices for downloading data on many stations and years (#6)
  • Performance improvements to get_weather() (#8)
  • Data packages generated with as_flights_package() now pass R CMD check! (#9)

v 0.2.0

  • Significant improvements to stability and performance
  • Add as_flights_package() function to convert anyflights() data objects to data-only packages
  • Add month argument to get_flights() and get_weather()
  • Allow users to return data objects without saving to file
  • Documentation improvements, bug fixes, and increases in unit testing coverage

v 0.1.0

  • Original release!
